channel.title: Runing a server
channel.description: i have gt a no-ip i gt a source edited the source abit now wat do i do to put it up and activate it plz help cos i mith think about puttin u as a adimin on a server plz help and i need how do u port foward

item.title: Runing a server
item.dc:creator: @william william
item.description:
@william wrote:

i think the way i did it was go to ‘start’ at the bottom of your screen then go to ‘controll panel’ then find your security centre, then u find the button u need there , do u know what to put in the port? if so put it in and click ok

btw i have the same prob, i dont know how to start the server using moparscape client.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 05:30:21 AM[/size][hr]that ok?

Read full topic
